channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The Super Bowl will return to Atlanta’s Mercedes-Benz Stadium in 2028
item.description: The Super Bowl will return to Atlanta in 2028 at the home of the Falcons, following a vote of approval by NFL team owners on Tuesday at the league’s annual fall meeting.

item.title: Sean Baker’s improvised road to ‘Anora’
item.description: Sean Baker’s “Anora” is by wide consensus one of the year’s best films and a best picture contender at the Oscars.

item.title: Michigan is paying $13M after shooter drill terrified psychiatric hospital for kids
item.description: A judge has approved a $13 million settlement in a lawsuit over an unannounced active shooter drill at a Michigan psychiatric hospital for children.
